/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from under a concrete overpass, providing a unique viewpoint of the city's daily life. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, cranes can be seen, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are somewhat muted, adding a sense of tranquility to the otherwise busy cityscape.
